message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,200,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for discussions.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,800,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While I understand your perspective on the market value, I believe the product's unique qualities justify a higher price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $2,000,000.  I'm confident this price reflects a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,500,000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.
